attributes.action: Issue a travel ban like US Executive Order 13769
attributes.additional_details: Please see the executive order which was approved by the US Supreme Court https://www.whitehouse.gov/presidential-actions/executive-order-protecting-nation-foreign-terrorist-entry-united-states/
attributes.background: The US Government has imposed a travel ban for people from Iran, Libya, Somalia, Syria and Yemen. North Korea and Venezuela. The US Supreme Court has upheld this on national security grounds. We should do the same

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

We are not sure what travel ban you would like to introduce.

US Executive Order 13769 was in force from January until March 2017 and included different countries from the ones listed in your petition.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
